author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Case Western Reserve, Sangamo Therapeutics get $11 Mln NIH Grant
text:
Feb 7 (Reuters) - Sangamo Therapeutics Inc:
* CASE WESTERN RESERVE AND SANGAMO THERAPEUTICS ANNOUNCE $11 MILLION NIH GRANT FOR STUDY OF GENE-EDITED T CELLS FOR VIRAL ERADICATION OF HIV
* NO SB-728-T PRODUCT-RELATED SERIOUS ADVERSE EVENTS WERE REPORTED IN SANGAMOâ€˜S SB-728-T CLINICAL TRIALS
* CO WILL BE CONTRIBUTING MATERIALS, EQUIPMENT, AND MANUFACTURING EXPERTISE FOR STUDY, WHICH IS EXPECTED TO BEGIN IN 2018 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
